AndroidAudioEncoder
Link copied to clipboard
class AndroidAudioEncoder : AudioEncoder

Android implementation of AudioEncoder using MediaCodec and MediaMuxer. Encodes PCM audio to AAC format in an M4A container.

AudioEncoder
Link copied to clipboard
interface AudioEncoder

Encodes PCM audio to compressed formats (AAC, MP3). Thread-safe: queueBuffer can be called from any thread.
